summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5847 for the improvement of 18th Avenue Southwest, from West Cambridge Street to West Roxbury Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77107, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
